title: narasimha mantravondiralu
sahitya:
narasimha mantravondiralu sAku durita kOTiya taridu bhAgyavanu koDuva


caraNam 1    shishuvAda prahlAdana bAdhe piDisida mantra asura kuladavarige shatru mantra 
vasudheyoLu pAdakigaLaghava hIruva mantra pashupatige priyavAda divya mantra
    caraNam 2    diTTa dhiruvarAyanige paTTa gaTTida mantra shiSTa vibhISaNa poreda mantra
kaTTa kaDeyali ajAmiLana salahida mantra muTTi bhajisidavarige mOkSa mantra
    caraNam 3    hiNDu bhUtava kaDidu tuNDu mADuva mantra koNDADo lOkake pracaDa mantra 
gaNDugali kadana uddaNDa vikrama mantra puNDarIkAkSa purandara viTTala mantra
